Ring Width

# Ring Width

## Usage

Please refer to the documentation on the Tailwind CSS website

## Compatibility

| Class              | Support     |
| ------------------ | ----------- |
| ```
ring-0
```     | 🌐 Web only |
| ```
ring-1
```     | 🌐 Web only |
| ```
ring-2
```     | 🌐 Web only |
| ```
ring
```       | 🌐 Web only |
| ```
ring-4
```     | 🌐 Web only |
| ```
ring-8
```     | 🌐 Web only |
| ```
ring-inset
``` | 🌐 Web only |
